alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Maverick (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:38AM CDT until April 23 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MAVERICK AND SOUTHWESTERN DIMMIT COUNTIES... At 738 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Cuero, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... El Indio, Gilson Groves, Catarina and Farias Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
